description.value:
You can work in concert with an ally to perform maneuvers in combat.

Prerequisites: Base attack bonus +6, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.feats.Item.0Pq35gvSI2JlD682]{Improved Combat Maneuver} (any)

Benefit: After you attempt a @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.U37n5tY5hn1ctzQL.JournalEntryPage.R33uiOMesYP0ISWl#combat-maneuver]{combat maneuver} against an enemy that’s also threatened by an ally, you can take a @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.U37n5tY5hn1ctzQL.JournalEntryPage.SKgwxeMd2gB1g2W8#guarded-step]{guarded step} as a reaction.

Teamwork Benefit: If an ally who also has this feat threatens the enemy you’re attempting the combat maneuver against, you can roll twice on the attack and take the better result.

system.requirements: Base attack bonus +6, Improved Combat Maneuver (any)
